Legal notice

In accordance with the provisions of Law No. 2004-575 of June 21, 2004 on confidence in the digital economy, users of the OrgaTrips website are informed of the identity of the various parties involved in its creation and monitoring.



Website editing

This site, accessible at the URL https://orgatrips.com (the 'Site'), is published by :


Cyril Deschamps, residing at 20 Les hauts de Mionnay, of French nationality (France), born on 19/06/2002, registered at the R.C.S. of BOURG-EN-BRESSE under the number Bourg-En-Bresse A 900 891 318, SIRET: 90089131800017.



Hosting

The Site is hosted by the company Pulseheberg, located at 9 Boulevard de Strasbourg 83000 TOULON, (telephone contact or email: +33422141360).



Director of publication

The Director of the publication of the Site is Cyril Deschamps.
